title: [Update: Rolling out] Google Messages prepares setting to disable pinch to zoom text size [Gallery]
content:
Google Messages is preparing a new setting that will keep you from accidentally zooming and increasing the size of your text.

Update: This option is now rolling out to those in the Google Messages beta.

more…

The post [Update: Rolling out] Google Messages prepares setting to disable pinch to zoom text size [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
